name: Zombidiots!
description:
A game to kill zombies. It's still in development! A lot of things will be changed!

CONTROLS:

WASD or arrow keys - move

Left click - Shoot

Right click or E - Interact (with outlined things)

Sprites from Kenney

Game made in Construct 3

NOTICE: timer is not working properly, and to interact with the couch you have to go to the corner of it.
